  1. Javascript
    function selectImg(){
        var chks = document.getElementsByName("chk");
        var imgs = document.getElementsByTagName("img")
        console.log(imgs, chks)
        for (var i = 0; i < chks.length; i++){
            if (chks[i].checked){
                imgs[i].style.display = 'inline'
            } else {
                imgs[i].style.display = 'none'
            }
        }
    }
    function clearDiv(){
        var chks = document.getElementsByName("chk")
        var imgs = document.getElementsByTagName("img")
        for (var i = 0; i < chks.length; i++){
        imgs[i].style.display = 'none'
        }
        for (var i = 0; i < chks.length; i++){
        chks[i].checked = ''
        }
    }
